kannada_original: ಇಂದು ಬಿರಿದಿದೆ ಮೊಗ್ಗು, ಸರದಿ ಇದಕಿದೆ ನಾಳೆ
english_transliteration: Indu biridide moggu, saradi idakide nāḷe
english_translation: Today the bud has bloomed, its turn is tomorrow
Will the gardener not pluck the blossomed flower?

kannada_original: ನಯದ ಚಿಗುರಲೆ ಇಂದು, ಅದುವ ಹಣ್ಣೆಲೆ ನಾಳೆ
english_transliteration: Nayada cigurale indu, aduva haṇṇele nāḷe
english_translation: Today it is a gentle sprout leaf, tomorrow it is a ripe leaf
Just as there is happiness, there is pain – Muddu Rama.
